attributes.action: fire the head of Student Finance England and conduct a full investigation into this farce
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Student finance have well and truly messed up this year, and we want somebody to stand up and take responsibility for this.

many thousands of students have had their applications messed up by the incompetancy of student finance, some even having to defer or give up on university altogether.  

We want the head of Student Finance England to resign for the failings of his company in the handling of the whole affair. an increase in applications is no excuse and it is the failings of the systems in place at student finance england to deal with this that means somebody has to go.

get rid of the head of student finance and get somebody in the organisation who has a clue, we are sick of being fobbed off!

rejection.details:
There are other petitions on this topic - perhaps you would consider adding your name to one of these:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/stufin/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/downwithSFE
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
